content: of rabbits similar in appearance to the californian rabbit with pink eyes the example has chocolate brown on the face ears legs and tail but these points can also be black lilac or blue head and body round 1 ​in chocolate make 6sc into m r 6 stitches © laura s pixie patch 6 round 2 ​in chocolate increase single_crochet increase in white single_crochet increase single_crochet 9 stitches round 3 ​ in white 2sc in chocolate single_crochet in same single_crochet as previous stitch 2sc in white increase 2sc increase single_crochet continue in white using rounds 4-7 of the european rabbit pattern round 8 ​ in white 11 single_crochet in chocolate b s in white 2sc in chocolate b s in white 2sc continue rounds 9-17 in white using the european rabbit pattern use the ears legs and tail of the the european rabbit pattern english spot the english spot or old english spot rabbit is a medium sized breed that was first bred in the 19​th c​ entury the large numbers of colour changes make this quite a tricky pattern w stands for white and b black round 1 ​in b make 6sc in m r 6 stitches round 2 ​in b increase single_crochet increase in w single_crochet increase single_crochet 9 stitches round 3 ​in w single_crochet increase single_crochet three times 12 stitches round 4 ​ in w single_crochet in b 2sc in w single_crochet increase in b 2sc in w 5sc 13 stitches round 5 ​ in w single_crochet in b 2sc in w 3sc in b 2sc in w 2sc increase single_crochet increase 15 stitches round 6 ​in w 10sc increase 2sc increase single_crochet 17 stitches © laura s pixie patch 7 round 7 ​in w 11sc b s 2sc b s 2sc 17 stitches add safety eyes if using between rounds 4 and 5 round 8 ​ in w 4sc decrease 11 single_crochet 16 stitches round 9 ​ 4sc in w 2sc in b 10sc in w 16 stitches round 10 ​2sc in w single_crochet in b single_crochet in w 2sc in b single_crochet in w single_crochet in b 8sc in w 16 stitches round 11 ​single_crochet in w single_crochet in same stitch as previous stitch in b 2sc increase in w 2sc in b increase 3sc in w single_crochet in same single_crochet as previous stitch in b 6sc in w 20 stitches round 12 ​3sc in w single_crochet in b 3sc in w 2sc in b 3sc in w single_crochet in b 7sc in w 20 stitches stuff the head round 13 ​ single_crochet in w single_crochet in b 3sc in w single_crochet in b single_crochet in w 2sc in b single_crochet in w single_crochet in b 3sc in w single_crochet in b 5sc in w round 14 ​ 3sc in w single_crochet in b single_crochet decrease in w 2sc in b decrease single_crochet in w single_crochet in b 7sc in w 18 stitches round 15 ​2sc in w single_crochet in b single_crochet decrease in w
